resources.string: If you like our updated app, please take a moment to rate it in Play Store. Thank You!

The latest data is already displayed

This program uses data from the \nhttps://mano.vilniustransport.lt website, which is updated every 24 hours, so sometimes information provided in this program may be a little bit outdated. This application is not an official product of the SĮ "Susisiekimo paslaugos" company and the authors of application are not responsible for data received from the https://mano.vilniustransport.lt website.
This will prevent app from mobile data usage
Notify me about tickets, which will expire soon
Notify me when I am running out of money
Add your Vilnius card.\n(Tap + on action bar in main app"'"s section, fill form and press add button) Thats all!
Can this app show outdated data?
NO, this app downloads data from server every time you open it. \nIf you have activated new ticket it will be showed only after 24 hours.\nRead more about this in app"'"s "'"About"'" section.
That"'"s really simple, just do a long press on card you want to delete.
It turns off notification sounds and notification light for limited time, it depends on sync frequency that you have set in settings of this app.
Why this app doesn"'"t support NFC?
We are working on this. Stay up to date and don"'"t write bad reviews about this in Google Play.
Will this app send any notifications?
Yes, this app will send notifications about your tickets and money. You can customize it in app"'"s settings.
